problems.questiontext: To secure your military's air superiority, you need to destroy an anti aircraft gun battery that is located on the endpoint of a river, which follows the function y=3 sqrt(2x+4) + 5

An important highway follows the function y=5 log x^3 + 7. A railway track is the same shape as the highway, but rotated 90 degrees about the origin. Sever the enemy's supply line, by bombing the westernmost intersection of them
